title: Little Nero's font ID
content:
Could anyone please identify the two fonts that make up the logo pictured below?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012052029im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/lnp1_3630.jpg)
  
Or, if you cannot find exact matches and/or believe the letters to be hand drawn, could you please direct me to similar fonts?
 [‹ Jonathan Segal font ID's](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012052029/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46071 "Go to previous forum topic") [Script/Handwritten Girly Typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012052029/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46069 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zap_rowsdower

comments.content:
I’d also say hand-drawn. You might want to go with Wide Latin for an approximation of the initials in the first two samples.

- Lex

P.S. “Keep the change, ya filthy animal.”
